title: Pop-Up Television Radio Model TR-475U
material_description: plastic body with silver metal handle, trim and antenna.
brief_description:
National Transistor TV. Model TR-475U. Pop-up screen and pull out handle for portablity.
No power cords, batteries only.

Brand: National

Serial no. F 3 (??) 1113
TQF8125

National Transistor TV
Model TR-475U DC12V 11W
Matsushita Electric Industrial Co. Ltd
Made in Japan
TBM 81685

Caution: To prevernt electric shock, do not remove cover. No user-serviceable parts inside, and pilot lamp soldered in place. Refer servicing to qualified service personnel.

Note: Before opening the pop-up portion of this TV. Please release two red screws fixed on the bottom side of the set. These screws are fixed for delivery safety only. The battery enclosed in this TV receiver is disconnected to assure longer life.

Before use, it must be properly connected. Please see instruction manual. For longer battery life: charge more than 10 hours before initial use. After each use once a month.

There are no power cords accompanying the TV.
description:
The National Transistor TV Radio Model TR-475U is a battery-operated, portable model features an inbuilt radio and a ‘pop-up’ television screen.
National was a brand used by Panasonic Corporation sell home appliances, personal appliances, and industrial appliances. The National brand operated in Australia until 1988 when it transferred to The Panasonic Corporation.
